original_title: Flaming Skull Hood Ornament Is Not Suitable For Use In Traffic
original_content:
Its one thing to mount a big skull—human or animal—to the front of your car. Really, though, a good hood skull should breathe fire to truly inspire enmity or awe. Thankfully, when [Anthony] went about modifying his ex-school bus, he was sure to equip it with suitably flaming equipment. Its dangerous, so dont try this one at home and melt your car, you hear?
The build started with an off-the-shelf replica cow skull, in lovely flame-resistant metal. It was then plumbed with a propane feed that could be triggered by a 12-volt solenoid. This was combined with a high-voltage coil driving a grill igniter to provide the necessary initiating spark.
To go forth with flames, first, a missile switch must be flipped up and engaged to arm the system. Then, hitting the skull-and-crossbones button will send fire surging forth from the front of the vehicle. Alternatively, a wireless keyfob can be used, which bypasses the arming system—so leaving the remote in a pocket is ill-advised.
Amazingly, a former project posted on Hackaday served as an inspiration for this build. Video after the break.
title: 自家製のスカルが炎を吹き出す!? ファイヤーブレス作成プロジェクト
body: 車に大きな頭蓋骨を取り付けるのは一つのことですが、本当に人々の敵意や畏怖を呼び起こすためには、頭蓋骨から火を吹く必要があります。この記事の主人公は、元々学校のバスだった車両を改造し、適切な炎を吹く装置を備えました。火を使った危険な装置なので、自宅で試すべきではありません。
titles: 自家製のスカルが炎を吹き出す!? ファイヤーブレス作成プロジェクト
自作スクールバスに搭載した炎を吹き出す装置
危険な炎の装置を車に装着！マニア必見の改造プロジェクト
ボタン一つで炎を発射！　自動車に装備する火炎放射器
ワイヤレスで操作する炎を噴射する装置を自作
